summary: Remember, fanfiction and shipping are different than reality. If it matches, ok. If a part of your ship is gay/queer good for...
body: Remember, fanfiction and shipping are different than reality. If it matches, ok. If a part of your ship is gay/queer good for them but their private life is different than a fanfiction or a ship. Just remember, Shipping is not bad, pushing people into a relationship or talk about their private life is.

reblog.comment: Remember, fanfiction and shipping are different than reality. If it matches, ok. tags: i have a lot to say about this vid but rn i just need to process
summary:
i’ve never seen dan be so emotional and real. it just made me love him even more. he’s so lovely and i’m so emo rn lol
in...
body:
i’ve never seen dan be so emotional and real. it just made me love him even more. he’s so lovely and i’m so emo rn lol

in addition to me being very happy for him for coming out publicly, it’s also just a really well made video! the way it’s organized, the drawings, the moments where he talks about supporting the community and ppl who haven’t come out yet. it’s just amazing.

i definitely recommend watching the whole video if you haven’t already. there’s so much to get out of it and dan touches on so many important topics. you’ll get so much more out of it than if you just read the highlights or gifs on tumblr.

he is so open and real and comforting! it will make you love and understand dan even more, so watch it kids!

reblog.comment:

in addition to me being very happy for him for coming out publicly, it’s also just a really well made video! the way it’s organized, the drawings, the moments where he talks about supporting the community and ppl who haven’t come out yet. it’s just amazing.

i definitely recommend watching the whole video if you haven’t already. there’s so much to get out of it and dan touches on so many important topics. you’ll get so much more out of it than if you just read the highlights or gifs on tumblr.

he is so open and real and comforting! it will make you love and understand dan even more, so watch it kids!

i definitely recommend watching the whole video if you haven’t already. there’s so much to get out of it and dan touches on so many important topics. you’ll get so much more out of it than if you just read the highlights or gifs on tumblr.

he is so open and real and comforting! it will make you love and understand dan even more, so watch it kids!

summary:
I woke up this morning and Daniel Howell said ‘lets give this bitch a heart attack”
Anyways, I stan one (1) king and his name is...
body:
I woke up this morning and Daniel Howell said ‘lets give this bitch a heart attack”

Anyways, I stan one (1) king and his name is Daniel James Howell and I’m proud of him and I love him and support him- is this what it’s like to be a mother?

Also, if anyone talks shit on him, I will throw hands.

blog.title: Mothman Cured My Moth Phobia
blog.description:
• Phoebe • 21 • UK • I love gay victorians and living different lives through book characters. my instragram

Pronouns - she / her but not rly bothered :)

tags: god its been so long since i used those tags but i've been watching them all the time fuckers
summary: This blog at its core will always be a fucking Dan and Phil blog and me as a queer person who’s been watching their shit for 8...
body:
This blog at its core will always be a fucking Dan and Phil blog and me as a queer person who’s been watching their shit for 8 years I am so happy that Dan has come out. His video is the best “coming out” video I have seen. It is so fucking difficult going through years of self h8 and doubt. Also being unsure on your sexuality in a community full of labels (nothing wrong with very specific labels fucking go for it if one fits my dude) is difficult and you don’t want to feel like you are betraying a label you used to attach to yourself too if things change. 

I’m so proud of anyone who comes out tbh, and especially when I relate so much to the feelings of internalised homophobia and doubt. I love him. Idc if that ain’t edgy and cool you lame fucks he and phil have been a stable source of joy for my anxious ass for so long. 

I love queers and good people.

(also lmao I first started watching them because a girl I fancied when I was 13 told me too love the gays)

Also being unsure on your sexuality in a community full of labels (nothing wrong with very specific labels fucking go for it if one fits my dude) is difficult and you don’t want to feel like you are betraying a label you used to attach to yourself too if things change. 

I’m so proud of anyone who comes out tbh, and especially when I relate so much to the feelings of internalised homophobia and doubt. I love him. Idc if that ain’t edgy and cool you lame fucks he and phil have been a stable source of joy for my anxious ass for so long.

Also being unsure on your sexuality in a community full of labels (nothing wrong with very specific labels fucking go for it if one fits my dude) is difficult and you don’t want to feel like you are betraying a label you used to attach to yourself too if things change. 

I’m so proud of anyone who comes out tbh, and especially when I relate so much to the feelings of internalised homophobia and doubt. I love him. Idc if that ain’t edgy and cool you lame fucks he and phil have been a stable source of joy for my anxious ass for so long.

summary: Dan Howell having the courage to come out to a whole bunch of people is such a beautiful thing in this world right now that I...
body: Dan Howell having the courage to come out to a whole bunch of people is such a beautiful thing in this world right now that I feel so blessed to be alive while it’s happening. That kinda a courage is something I look up to so much in life and for someone like Dan, who is someone I already looked up to so much to do it, really just made it just that much better. Also that’s a rocking sequin jacket btw.
